content.description: Sit start the aesthetic clean arete with a fat right-hand pinch on the arete and a super low left-hand undercling found on the face of the overhang. Find some feet and the body positioning and pull onto the wall before firing for an incut left-hand sidepull 6 feet up. From here a few more moves up the arete gains some nice slippery slopers for the top out!Â
content.protection: 2 pads. The top is puntable and there are many rocks to hit with a tailbone.
content.location: This boulder problem is found on the south face of the Ivysaur Boulder and climbs the laser-cut arete on the overhanging side.

content.description: This sub-area contains a cluster of boulders found to the left of the awesome "Finn-land" block. The area has a few fun sloper lip traverses in the V2-V3 range, while also having a few projects left undone. This area is also home to the aesthetic area classic, "Ivysaur".
